Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Starter generator malfunction. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 15/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
